summary: B.Tech student in Electronics and Telecommunications with expertise in AI/ML, full-stack development, and competitive programming. Experienced in building production-grade ML systems, RAG-based chatbots, and mobile applications. Solved 700+ coding problems across competitive platforms with top rankings.

bullets: Built ML-driven Green Points engine using FastAPI & Random Forest for real-time reward prediction
Automated e-waste pricing via multi-feature regression and achieved accuracy of RÂ² = 0.85+
Integrated AI microservice into a Node.js/MongoDB stack with JWT-secured wallet transactions
Completed a 10-week AI-ML virtual internship supported by Google Developers
Trained CNNs and fine-tuned models for real-world object detection using TensorFlow
Applied data augmentation to optimize accuracy for production-grade scenarios

projects.title: Jobeez: AI-Powered Resume Parser & Job Matcher
projects.description: Engineered a full-stack resume parsing with AI-powered job matching, improving job search efficiency by 85%. Implemented advanced NLP techniques using spaCy & BERT for extracting skills with 92% accuracy.
highlights: 92% accuracy in skill extraction using NLP

projects.title: FinMate: Smart UPI-Based Expense & Budgeting Assistant
projects.description: Built an SMS-based UPI parser with 92%+ accuracy for extracting amount, merchant, and UPI ID. Added SQLite-backed transaction & budget CRUD and Zustand state management with modular UI.

projects.title: Apta: Smart Lifestyle & Learning Recommender
projects.description: Built TF-IDF vectorization + cosine similarity to get accurate recommendation over 150 lifestyle items. Created time/interest-based filtering, reducing irrelevant suggestions by 70% through scoring algorithms.

projects.title: Conversational AI: Memory-Aware Document Q&A
projects.description: Developed a RAG-based chatbot with FAISS for document search & context-aware multi-mode Q&A. Integrated LangChain memory and achieved 100% API test coverage for robust, persistent conversations.
highlights: RAG-based architecture with FAISS vector search

items: Solved 700+ problems across CodeChef, LeetCode & Codeforces
CodeChef: Rating 1682 | 3 Stars | Top 4.73% | 400+ problems solved
2X Top 100 in CodeChef Contests | Ranks 18 & 72 in Starters 196 & 199
